sentences.sContent: A large detachment of police was used to segregate the two rival camps of protesters.
sentences.sCn: 一大队分遣警察被派来隔离两群敌对的抗议者。

synos.tran: 使隔离；[生物]使分离；在…实行种族隔离

words.tran: 种族隔离主义的；种族隔离主义者的

trans.tranCn: 使隔离；使分离；在…实行种族隔离
trans.tranOther: to separate one group of people from others, especially because they are of a different race, sex, or religion
